attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: due to the extremely high price of house prices and the high private rents charged (approx £600 per week in the south east) i feel it is time to start a council house building progamme to house our young adults and families who will never be able to afford to buy a home

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
